scripts.build:repos: cd repos && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p public/codeology/dist && cp -r repos/dist/* public/codeology/dist/ && cp repos/index.html public/codeology/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content=fs.readFileSync('public/codeology/index.html','utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('public/codeology/index.html', content.replace(/\/dist\//g, '/api/codeology/dist/'));"
scripts.update:repos: git submodule update --remote repos && npm run build:repos
